alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 4:43AM MST until March 02 at 1:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM PST/5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT PST/1 AM MST WEDNESDAY NIGHT ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 14 inches, especially in the Arizona Strip. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Plateau and Northwest Deserts. In Nevada, Sheep Range. * WHEN...From 4 PM PST/5 PM MST this afternoon to midnight PST/1 AM MST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
